title: Executive Order 8741-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5623 of May 15, 1931, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, Executive Order No. 5623 of May 15, 1931, withdrawing public lands in California pending a resurvey, is hereby revoked.
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official filing of the plat of the resurvey of the lands involved.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8741-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5623 of May 15, 1931, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372091
